Earlier today, I had a virtual meeting with Councils on Aging that serve communities all across #MA3. 

Each of these incredible organizations provides lifesaving and life enhancing services to our seniors.

If you have to go out in public, be responsible ‚Äì wear a mask and maintain a safe social distance from others. If you‚Äôre wondering what that distance is, I tell my girls it‚Äôs at least one mommy, or Lori Trahan, of space between you and others. #TrahanTownHall

"We‚Äôve begun to flatten the curve, but we‚Äôre not out of the woods yet. Every day that we do our part to slow the spread of COVID-19 is one day closer to safely reopening our state." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

"The weather is getting warmer, patience is wearing thin and In my home it‚Äôs getting increasingly difficult to explain to my young girls why they still can't hug their grandparents or play with friends." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

"As we continue to navigate this new normal, I want you to know that you‚Äôre not alone. The past seven weeks have been hard, and all of us are feeling the weight of this stress on our bodies and our minds." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall
I want to thank @MassLtGov and our expert panelists, @SBA_NewEngland Wendell Davis and @LawrenceGenHosp  Deb Wilson, one more time for taking the time out of their busy schedules to join us.
"If anyone listening has a medical problem, please contact your doctor. If it's an emergency, please come to the hospital." Deborah Wilson of @LawrenceGenHosp #TrahanTownHall
"Our team is meeting regularly to ensure that when we reopen, it is done with the patients' needs put first."- Deborah Wilson of @LawrenceGenHosp #TrahanTownHall

"The PPP is all about payroll and all about employees. Whatever loan you do get - the goal is 75% of that goes to payroll. If you use it all for rent, it is going to be reduced." - - @SBA_NewEngland Administrator Wendell Davis

"Let's say you take out a loan and ultimately you cannot hire everyone back. You're able to hire a number of employees back. Whatever amount you allocate to payroll, that amount will be forgiven." - @SBA_NewEngland Administrator Wendell Davis

"PPP is a life-saver for many small businesses and I greatly appreciate the fact that the SBA has had to stand-up this brand new $660 billion program very fast. SBA has essentially had to build this plane while you‚Äôre flying it." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

During this pandemic, transparency & accountability is crucial to saving lives & safeguarding our health care heroes. The families we represent have placed a sacred trust in nursing homes, & in return should have assurance that their loved ones‚Äô health & safety will be protected.

"Together with @SenMarkey and @SenWarren, I requested that CMS enact additional oversight measures to protect staff and residents at Life Care Centers and other senior living facilities from COVID-19. " - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

"I became involved in the case at the Life Care Center of Nashoba Valley when local officials made us aware of the number of emergency calls made to the facility by the fire department and EMTs." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall
"This pandemic has highlighted the importance of nursing homes having robust plans for emergency preparedness and infectious disease control." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall
"There's no question that testing is going to become a regular part of our lives in the near future." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

"Antibody testing became available in MA last week. It looks for the presence of the antibodies in the blood stream. This indicates a person has had an immune response to COVID-19." - Deborah Wilson of @LawrenceGenHosp #TrahanTownHall

"I have drafted legislation -- called the Pandemic Production Act -- which would allow the federal government to partner with industry the way we do for our national defense." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

"This country is still the beginning of this pandemic and we must reinforce our domestic manufacturing supply chain for PPE, critical medical devices, testing kits and components, as well as production of treatments and a vaccine."- Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

"In order to treat patients and protect frontline workers, states and hospitals have been locked in a bidding war, competing for scarce equipment as cases multiply by the hour." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall

"We have a staff person that has to work full time to coordinate all the food and family donations that continue to come in. Those are the highlights of how we are trying to support our frontline workers."- Deborah Wilson of @LawrenceGenHosp #TrahanTownHall
"We are very sensitive to the emotional toll that caring for such seriously ill patients can be. Mindfulness and self care are critical." - Deborah Wilson of @LawrenceGenHosp #TrahanTownHall
"We are plateauing, but the patients are very sick. We have about 20 new in-patient admissions each day because of COVID-19." - Deborah Wilson of @LawrenceGenHosp #TrahanTownHall

"In a good year in #MA, our office would do about $350 million loans. In that 12 days of round 1, more than $12 billion hit the streets for MA small businesses." -@SBA_NewEngland Administrator Wendell Davis
"We want to make sure that the smallest of the small businesses get access to these funds." - @SBA_NewEngland Administrator Wendell Davis #TrahanTownHall
"I am not aware of any bank in New England that is experiencing a backlog of applications." - @SBA_NewEngland Administrator Wendell Davis #TrahanTownHall
"We paid out half a billion dollars in benefits for people who applied to PUA. We'll continue to serve this need as long as it exists." - @MassLtGov #TrahanTownHall
"53% of our hospital beds are empty. That means we are flattening the curve." - @MassLtGov #TrahanTownHall
"If you have an illness that needs to be treated, you need to call your doctor and go to a hospital to get treated." - @MassLtGov #TrahanTownHall
"We have had a plateauing of cases. However, yesterday we had the highest number of deaths that were COVID in nature." - @MassLtGov #TrahanTownHall
"We will get through this crisis, but we must ensure that no one is left behind." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall
Join us LIVE now ‚¨áÔ∏è #TrahanTownHall https://t.co/o8wwE0vJen

"I know it‚Äôs been a long, hard seven weeks, but our actions save lives. That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs more important than ever that we continue listening to the scientists, the experts." - Rep. Trahan #TrahanTownHall
